data.title: Berkshire halves Apple stake, boosts cash to $277 billion as it gets 'defensive’

data.title: World’s Richest Lose $134B in Stock Slump

data.title: Meta jumps on solid earnings beat but warns of 'significant' spending expansion
data.description: Meta shares soared more than 9% in early trading Thursday after the company reported better-than-expected second quarter earnings results Wednesday, and despite warning it expects to see 'significant' capital expenditures growth in 2025.
